when_to_say: Use this when referring to the act of eating or consuming food.
example: Saya mahu makan nasi. (I want to eat rice.)

when_to_say: Use this when referring to the act of drinking.
example: Dia sedang minum air. (He is drinking water.)

when_to_say: Use this when referring to a home or residence.
example: Mereka tinggal di rumah besar. (They live in a big house.)

when_to_say: Use this when referring to a book or reading material.
example: Saya membaca buku. (I am reading a book.)

when_to_say: Use this to describe something or someone as beautiful.
example: Bunga itu sangat cantik. (The flower is very beautiful.)

when_to_say: Use this to describe the size of something as large.
example: Anjing itu besar. (The dog is big.)

when_to_say: Use this to describe the size of something as small.
example: Meja ini kecil. (This table is small.)

when_to_say: Use this to describe speed or urgency.
example: Kereta itu sangat cepat. (The car is very fast.)

when_to_say: Use this to describe something as slow.
example: Dia berjalan lambat. (He walks slowly.)

when_to_say: Use this to compliment someone’s intelligence or skills.
example: Murid itu sangat pandai. (That student is very clever.)

when_to_say: Use this when describing rainy weather.
example: Hari ini ada hujan. (Today there is rain.)

when_to_say: Use this to refer to the sun in the sky.
example: Matahari sangat terang. (The sun is very bright.)

when_to_say: Use this to refer to the moon.
example: Bulan bersinar di langit. (The moon shines in the sky.)

when_to_say: Use this to refer to stars in the sky.
example: Bintang-bintang kelihatan jelas malam ini. (The stars are visible tonight.)

when_to_say: Use this to describe clouds in the sky.
example: Langit penuh dengan awan putih. (The sky is full of white clouds.)

when_to_say: Use this to describe windy conditions.
example: Angin bertiup kencang hari ini. (The wind is blowing strongly today.)

when_to_say: Use this to describe something that is hot or warm.
example: Cuaca sangat panas hari ini. (The weather is very hot today.)

when_to_say: Use this to describe something that is cold.
example: Bilik ini sangat sejuk. (This room is very cold.)

when_to_say: Use this when referring to being acquainted with someone.
example: Saya kenal dia. (I know him/her.)

when_to_say: Use this when referring to knowing information.
example: Saya tahu jawapannya. (I know the answer.)

when_to_say: Use this when talking about being alive.
example: Dia hidup bahagia. (He lives happily.)

when_to_say: Use this to talk about studying or learning.
example: Saya belajar bahasa Melayu. (I am learning Malay.)
